name: Angel Kid
description:
Angel Kid is a game based on the popular franchise Kid Icarus (Please Nintendo don't send your ninja lawyers). Embark on a small adventure to get out of hell!

Controls

Left Hand - Arrows, Q, Space Bar
Right Hand - WASD, K, Space Bar

If you want me to turn this into a full-fledged game, please leave a comment down below and consider supporting the creator (that would be me).

Thanks for playing!
